availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alice Reynolds Enlow (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Daughter of Joseph L. Reynolds and Eliza Reynolds. Married John E. Enlow in Louisville, Kentucky on December 6, 1865. Resident in Louisville, Kentucky in 1850.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, p. 507. Kentucky Marriage Records_, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film 000482710, p. 252.
